Title: Steven Universe: The Movie
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Writer: Ian Jones-Quartey (story by), Chris Pianka, Miki Brewster (Written by), Lamar Abrams (Written by)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven thinks his time defending the Earth is over, but when a new threat comes to Beach City, Steven faces his biggest challenge yet.
